title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2: Slate Spoiler Special
description:
Slate critics Dana Stevens and Dan Kois host a Spoiler Special podcast review of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2. Listen after you've seen the movie or if you don't mind hearing spoilers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
